alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 7:10AM CST until January 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and black ice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures in the middle 20s are expected through sunrise. Any snow melt on sidewalks, parking lots and area roads may refreeze into black ice.
info.instruction: Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution, especially at intersections and highway onramps and offramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Use low beam headlights and be prepared for rapid reductions in visibility.
